      • createClient

        public Map<String,String> createClient(org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate restTemplate,
                                       String iamRegistration,
                                       String uuid,
                                       String userEmail,
                                       String scopes)
        Description copied from interface: IamService
        Create an IAM client setting the minimal information, in addition to the mail field. As output it gives the client_id and registration_access_token of the created client.
        Specified by:
        createClient in interface IamService
        Parameters:
        restTemplate - object used to make HTTP requests
        iamRegistration - registration endpoint used to create a client
        uuid - uuid of the deployment, used to set the client name
        userEmail - user email, used to set the contacts field of the client
        scopes - scopes to set for the new client
        Returns:
        a map of client_id:registration_access_token

      • deleteClient

        public boolean deleteClient(org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate restTemplate,
                            String clientId,
                            String iamUrl,
                            String token)
        Description copied from interface: IamService
        Delete a client.
        Specified by:
        deleteClient in interface IamService
        Parameters:
        restTemplate - object used to make HTTP requests
        clientId - client_id
        iamUrl - IAM endpoint to contact for the client deletion
        token - the registration_access_token used for the deletion
        Returns:
        true if the deletion has been successful

        clientId - client_id

        owner - the id of the owner to be assigned to the client
